Crimes.Crime_Name: Misrepresentation under Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether the inclusion of a fraudulent IELTS document constitutes material misrepresentation
Crimes.Procedural_Context: Judicial review under section 72(1) of the Act
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Applicant claimed lack of knowledge, but court found no impact on determination
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Submission of false language proficiency results
Crimes.Evaluation_Standard: Materiality of misrepresentation in influencing decision-making
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Document was material and designed to induce error
Crimes.Regulation_Cited: Section 40(1)(a) of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Application_Error: Inclusion of fraudulent document in application
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Reasonableness of finding of material misrepresentation
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Material misrepresentation via fraudulent IELTS document
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: Claim of lack of knowledge considered but not accepted
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Lack of knowledge due to consultant's actions

Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether the submission of a fraudulent IELTS result constitutes material misrepresentation
Crimes.Procedural_Context: Judicial review under Section 72(1) of the Act
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Applicant denied knowledge; court upheld decision regardless
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Unauthorized submission of forged language test result
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Document was fraudulent and influenced application outcome
Crimes.Regulation_Cited: Section 40(1)(a) of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Application_Error: Submission of falsified document by consultant
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Reasonableness of finding of fraud and materiality
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Verification and authenticity of test results
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Lack of knowledge and unauthorized action by consultant
